Detailed Description

Base class for all Logos wizard pages.

This class gives us a standardized format for the titles of our wizard pages, and standard/default behavior when the user clicks the "Cancel" and "Help" buttons within the wizard.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

LogosWizardPage::LogosWizardPage ( const wxString &  titleStr,
const wxString &  subtitleStr,
LogosWizard *  parent,
wxWizardPage *  prev = NULL,
wxWizardPage *  next = NULL 
)

Constructor.

Creates the title and subtitle (set off against a differently colored background), as well as the basic sizer that the window uses.

Parameters:
titleStrThe title of this wizard page
subtitleStrThe subtitle of this wizard page, a short sentence describing its use
parentThe wxWizard this page will be used with
prevThe previous wizard page
nextThe next wizard page

Member Function Documentation

void LogosWizardPage::OnHelp ( wxWizardEvent &  event) [private]

Show the help contents.

If derived classes do not choose to intercept the wxWizard help message, this handler will be invoked, which simply shows the help's contents.

Parameters:
eventEvent passed from the wxWizard

Reimplemented in EvoFinishPage, EvoPage, OneShotFinishPage, OneShotPage, PlayersPage, and TypePage.

void LogosWizardPage::OnPageChange ( wxWizardEvent &  event) [private]

Send a wxEVT_DATA_UPDATE when the page changes.

Parameters:
eventEvent pass from the wxWizard
void LogosWizardPage::OnWizardCancel ( wxWizardEvent &  event) [private]

Ensure the user wants to quit.

Since the "Cancel" button on the wizard will in fact quit Logos, present a message box confirming that this is the user's intent.

Parameters:
eventEvent passed from the wxWizard

Member Data Documentation

wxWindow* LogosWizardPage::container [private]

Container window for title and subtitle.

This container paints a differently-colored background underneath the title and subtitle.

wxBoxSizer* LogosWizardPage::containerSizer [private]

Sizer for the contents of the container.

LogosWizard* LogosWizardPage::parent [protected]

Parent of this wizard page.

wxBoxSizer* LogosWizardPage::sizer [protected]

Sizer used for this window.

This sizer will contain the title and subtitle after the window is constructed. All derived classes of LogosWizardPage should add their controls to this sizer.

wxStaticText* LogosWizardPage::subtitle [private]

Subtitle text.
